attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. This low mileage 2020 Renault Kwid Dynamique provides an affordable and reliable option for the first time buyer or even for those looking for a vehicle for their kids for college. With responsive handling and an elevated ride height, the Kwid delivers a smooth and comfortable ride.The standout feature has to be that slick 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Bluetooth and sat-nav functionality. It’s included on the Dynamique and a feature that will prove a big drawcard for the youthful, tech-savvy audience.

Offer includes free gift of your choice from one of the following options:
- Smash & Grab tint
- Auto Armor ( 2 in 1)
- R1000 fuel voucher

•	We deliver countrywide
•	Trade-ins Welcome
•	Finance Arranged
